src:
Cari Striker Baru, Barcelona Mulai Lirik Erling Haaland
06 Nov 2019, 21:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juara La Liga, Barcelona diberitakan sudah mengantongi nama striker yang akan coba mereka datangkan musim depan. El Blaugrana diberitakan tertarik untuk merekrut Erling Braut Haaland dari FC Salzburg.
Sejak musim panas kemarin, beredar kabar bahwa Barcelona tengah berburu striker baru. Mereka mulai mencari sosok pelapis sekaligus penerus Luis Suarez di skuat mereka.
Sejauh ini ada beberapa nama penyerang yang dikaitkan dengan tim asal Catalunya. Salah satu yang terbaru adalah penyerang FC Salzburg, Erling Haaland.
Dilansir Marca, Barca cukup serius untuk merekrut Haaland. Mereka diberitakan bakal mencoba untuk merekrut striker Norwegia itu dalam waktu dekat.

Mengapa Barcelona ingin mendatangkan Haaland? Simak informasi selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Search for New Strikers, Barcelona Start Lyrics Erling Haaland
Nov 6 2019, 21:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - La Liga champions, Barcelona are reported to have pocketed the names of strikers who will try to bring them next season. El Blaugrana was reportedly interested in recruiting Erling Braut Haaland from FC Salzburg.
Since last summer, it was rumored that Barcelona were hunting for a new striker. They began to look for a coating figure and successor to Luis Suarez in their squad.
So far there are several names of attackers who are associated with the team from Catalunya. One of the newest is FC Salzburg striker, Erling Haaland.
Reported by Marca, Barca is serious enough to recruit Haaland. They reportedly will try to recruit the Norwegian striker in the near future.

Why does Barcelona want to bring in Haaland? Check out the complete information below.
